channel.title: Adding an exception
channel.description:
Well i want to add an exception so that if i die i don`t get teleported and they don`t remove my items how do i do this ? :eek: :confused: :confused: i`m using testscape.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 03:04:31 PM[/size][hr]I mean something like this
BooleanApplyDead (ignorePlayer.tom 10 10 11)
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Please do not double post/bump - the edit function exists for a reason[/center]

item.title: Adding an exception
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Iâ€™m not sure about this but.
Try this.

public boolean ApplyDead() { if (IsDeadTimer == false) { actionAmount++; actionTimer = 0; ResetAttack(); ResetAttackNPC(); setAnimation(0x900); IsDeadTimer = true; ApplyDead(); } if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) { resetAnimation(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = 100; setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); PoisonDelay = 9999999; KillerId = playerId; } return true; }

Replace that with the old boolean.

Read full topic
